title: The Book of Werewolves: Being an Account of a Terrible Superstition
creator: Sabine Baring-Gould
description: LibriVox recording of The Book of Werewolves: Being an Account of a Terrible Superstition by Sabine Baring-Gould. A survey of the myths and legends concerning lycanthropy from ancient times to the Victorian Era. (Summary by A. Gramour) For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording. For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org. M4B format available
subject: audiobook; librivox; public domain; werewolf; werewolves; superstition; myths; lycanthropy; mythology; Scandinavia; folklore
source: Librivox recording of a public-domain text
